Package Cmp3\Base

Class summary

Exception General cmp3 exception
UndefinedPropertyException Property exception for missing property
UndefinedGetPropertyException Property exception for missing get property
UndefinedSetPropertyException Property exception for missing set property
WrongTypeException Wrong type exception
WrongParameterException Exception to be used when parameter of a function call doesn't match the expected.
UndefinedConfigurationException Exception to be used when an expected configuration is not set
Base Base class with generic constructor / array setter
BaseConfig {@inheritdoc}
